name: GUERREIRO KUIKURO [02]
description: Kuikuro Chief's Son | First of all, I would like to thank my ancestors || I also thank the Kuikuro culture, in the Upper Xingu, which is in the center of Brazil, that allowed me to register using three-dimensional scanning techniques part of its people, objects and nature, so that it may be possible to create works from these digital assets || Clelio de Paula | @VirtualArtista | 2021
